column4: I hane not been able to install ubuntu. As windows boots, Ubuntu should install in that environment?
I've tried over and over to boot from cd but windows loads
you will have to go to your system setup from the memory test screen (information there on how to) and make your cd as a boot option
i just press del on memory test, go to advanced setup and make floppy boot one, cd0 boot two and hd0 as three. like this, your system will test for floppy and cd before booting windows
